about.presentation: I am committed to continuous learning and improvement, focusing on building efficient and scalable web solutions.

resume.description: Full-stack software development utilizing modern web technologies such as React with TypeScript to build intuitive and user-friendly interfaces, as well as NodeJS and Express.js for API development and to ensure a scalable and maintainable server-side architecture.
